refnamediv.refpurpose: Configures MicroDAQ DIO functions and direction

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This block configures MicroDAQ DIO alternative functions and DIO direction.
This block can be used in host simulation mode and for code generation.

simplelist.member: mdaq_dio_set : Sets MicroDAQ DIO output state
mdaq_dio_get : Reads MicroDAQ DIO input state
mdaqDIOWrite : Sets MicroDAQ DIO output state from Scilab script
mdaqDIORead : Reads MicroDAQ DIO input state from Scilab script
mdaq_dio_func : Sets alternative DIO function from Scilab script
mdaq_dio_dir : Sets MicroDAQ DIO bank direction from Scilab script

member.link: Link to the Scilab help page
